titleStmt.title: A covenant to walk with God in an holy stedfastness to maintain the peace of our spirits with God in Christ. Solemnly entred into by certain persons resolving to live according to, and in the power of the life of Christ in them.
titleStmt.author: W. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Philemon Stephens,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
